metadata.Plot: Jewish Luck revolves around Menakhem Mendl (one of Sholem Aleichem's characters), a daydreaming entrepreneur who specializes in doomed strike-it-rich schemes. Despite Jewish oppression in Tsarist Russia, Mendl continues to pursue his dreams and his continued persistence transforms him from schlemiel to hero.
metadata.Writer: Sholom Aleichem, Isaak Babel, Grigori Gritscher-Tscherikower
metadata.Actors: Solomon Mikhoels, Moisei Goldblat, Tamara Adelgeym
